A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I understand why some people are frustrated with a few details in this movie\, some are valid complaints\, but to have so many half-star reviews is absurd. This is a very vocal minority from a very devoted fan base. Honestly\, I won't know how I really feel about this movie for years\, but it was exciting\, emotional\, surprising\, and funny. If you hated Ewoks\, then maybe the details will bother you enough to actually dislike this movie and the choices made by the creators. If not\, then I don't see how you couldn't enjoy this movie.
